title.rendered: Compass Airlines Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Compass Airlines – Ceased operations on April 5, 2020

Compass Airlines, LLC, is a regional airline headquartered in Delta Air Lines Building C at Minneapolis−Saint Paul International Airport in Fort Snelling, Hennepin County, Minnesota; prior to December 16, 2009, it was headquartered in unincorporated Fairfax County, Virginia, United States, east of the Chantilly CDP. The airline launched inaugural service with a single Bombardier CRJ200LR aircraft under the Northwest Airlink (now Delta Connection) brand between Minneapolis/St. Paul and Washington, D.C. on May 2, 2007. On August 21, 2007, it began flying two Embraer 175 76-passenger aircraft, and expanded to 36 aircraft by December 2008.

Compass Airline Address :CORPORATE HQ
7500 Airline Drive, Ste. 130
Minneapolis, MN 55450

Phone : (612) ​713-6800

Fax :  (612) 713-6995

CUSTOMER SERVICE

Phone : Delt​a Air Lines Customer Care : 1-800-455-2720

American Airlines Customer Relations : 817-786-3778

American Airlines Reservations : 1-800-433-7300​

Delta Air Lines Reservations : 1-800-221-1212

American Airlines Flight Status Notification : 1-800-223-5436

Delta Air Lines Flight Status and Information : 1-800-325-1999

Compass Airline Official website : http://www.compassairline.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Compass Airlines

  • Delta Airlines Embraer 175
  • American Airlines Embraer 175

Compass Airlines Baggage Allowance

Compass Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Compass Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Comair Limited Special Assistance Services :

Travelling while pregnant in Compass Airlines :

For more details visit : http://www.compassairline.com/passengers/Pages/Customer-Commitments.aspx

Queries handled by Compass Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Compass Airlines, Australia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Compass Airlines, Australia : (click on the stars below)
